lead_paragraph: William Schuman, whose centennial is this year, was a composer and educator who continues to influence the American musical scene.
snippet: William Schuman, whose centennial is this year, was a composer and educator who continues to influence the American musical scene.

headline.main: A Shaper of American Music, and Musicians
